sentences.en: He was known for risky tactics that ranged from audacious to outrageous.
sentences.cn: 他以大胆甚至是骇人听闻的冒险战术而闻名。

sentences.en: Her audacious attitude helps her win the contest.
sentences.cn: 她大胆的态度帮助她赢得了比赛.

sentences.en: I grew more hardened and audacious than ever.
sentences.cn: 我比以前更心狠,更大胆.

sentences.en: It was an astonishingly audacious and professional robbery.
sentences.cn: 这是一次令人瞠目的大胆而又专业的抢劫.

sentences.en: It was audacious of him to try that.
sentences.cn: 他试图做那种事,真是鲁莽.

sentences.en: Luca clever and audacious, offer his help assistance to students.
sentences.cn: 卢卡是聪明的和大胆的, 他帮助学生们.

sentences.en: New York can be an audacious, unique and intense place.
sentences.cn: 纽约市有可能在外人眼中是大胆、特又紧张的地方, 在俗称[苹果]纽约市更格外的显出城市生活的都会步调.

sentences.en: She was a designing , an audacious and an unscrupulous young person.
sentences.cn: 她是个工于心计、轻佻放肆,不讲道德的年轻女子.

sentences.en: Success in the Desert would have meant the destruction of Rommel's audacious force.
sentences.cn: 沙漠战事的得手,本来会意味着隆美尔的气焰嚣张的军队的毁灭.

sentences.en: the risks involved in such an audacious operation
sentences.cn: 如此大胆的行动中存在的风险

sentences.en: The Tirpitz had been disabled by the audacious and heroic attack of our midget submarines.
sentences.cn: “提尔古茨”号战列舰由于我们小型潜艇发动的大胆而英勇的袭击而丧失了战斗力.

sentences.en: Why has Britain suddenly become audacious?
sentences.cn: 为何英国突然变得富有冒险精神 呢 ?

sentences.en: You are extremely audacious to open out a mine!
sentences.cn: 你竟敢擅自开矿,真是胆大妄为.

sentences.en: You are extremely audacious to steal a purse in broad daylight!
sentences.cn: 光天化日下抢钱包,你真是胆大包天.

sentences.en: You are monstrously audacious , how dare you misappropriate public funds?
sentences.cn: 你真是狗胆包天, 公家的钱也敢挪用?

sentences.en: You been into some other audacious mischief when I wasn't around , like enough. "
sentences.cn: 刚才,我不在的时候,说不定你又干了些别的胆大妄为的淘气事. ”

words.tran_cn: 无畏地；放肆地；大胆创新地；无拘无束地

trans.tran_cn: 大胆的，鲁莽的，大胆创新的
trans.tran_en: showing great courage or confidence in a way that is impressive or slightly shocking
